WorkItem.Description: I'm still getting the loop duplication issue when unbundling 835 files.  I grabbed the latest changeset to test and it's still there. I'm unbundling at LoopId 2000.
WorkItem.Summary: Unbundle loop duplication issue still exists with 835 files

Comments.Message: I'll take a look this weekend.
Any word on getting this resolved?  I'd try to tackle it, but don't know where to start...  If you can point me to a certain section of the code, I could attempt a fix. :)

Sorry, I have not been able to get to this yet.  It has to do with the OopFactory.X12.Parsing.UnbundlingService which is called from the X12Parser.UnbundleByLoop method.  I thought I had created unit tests for all these at OopFactory.X12.Tests.Unit.Unbundling.UnbundlingTester, but it appears that I did not create a test for LoopId 2000.  I have promoted your role to developer.  You are welcome to looking into a fix or at least adding a unit test for your LoopId 2000 that should be expected to pass once we find a fix.  It might be mid September before I can focus some time on this issue.
Fixed by ssage in change set 10378.
Thanks so much!  I can confirm that initial testing shows the issue is indeed taken care of.  If something shows up later I'll let the team know.
